meanings.definition: A type of dance move where a person spins on one foot with the other raised and bent.
meanings.sent1: During the ballet, the dancer executed graceful pirouettes on stage.
meanings.sent2: She practiced her pirouettes diligently to improve her ballet performance.
meanings.sent3: The little girl pretended to do pirouettes in her room, imagining she was a ballerina.
meanings.sent4: Her pirouettes were like a spinning top, mesmerizing the audience with her skill.
meanings.sent5: The pirouettes of the dancer were so elegant, they seemed to defy gravity.

meanings.sent1: He pirouettes gracefully during the dance recital, impressing the audience.
meanings.sent2: The ballerina pirouettes effortlessly, showcasing her talent and agility.
meanings.sent3: The penguin tried to pirouette on the ice, but ended up slipping comically.
meanings.sent4: As she pirouettes through life, she faces each challenge with poise and determination.
meanings.sent5: The figure skater pirouettes across the ice, leaving a trail of beauty in her wake.
